pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
